name: 高等分析學專論（一）
description: The goal of this course is to familiarize students with important chemical species that may exist in food, cosmetics, pharmaceutical products, and different environmental matrices, along with their degradation mechanisms and analytical methods.
goals: The goal of this course is to familiarize students with important chemical species that may existdifferent environmental matrices
syllabus:
1\. Contents regarding raw food materials will be discussed from week 1 to 3.  
  
2\. Contents regarding cosmetics will be discussed from week 4 to 9.  
  
3\. Contents regarding pharmaceutical products will be discussed from  week 10 to 14.  
  
4\. Contents regarding environmental pollutants will be discussed from week 15 to 18.
